
{{alias}}
    Regular expression to capture a POSIX path dirname.

    Examples
    --------
    > var dir = {{alias}}.exec( '/foo/bar/index.js' )[ 1 ]
    '/foo/bar'
    > dir = {{alias}}.exec( './foo/bar/.gitignore' )[ 1 ]
    './foo/bar'
    > dir = {{alias}}.exec( 'foo/file.pdf' )[ 1 ]
    'foo'
    > dir = {{alias}}.exec( '/foo/bar/file' )[ 1 ]
    '/foo/bar'
    > dir = {{alias}}.exec( 'index.js' )[ 1 ]
    ''
    > dir = {{alias}}.exec( '.' )[ 1 ]
    '.'
    > dir = {{alias}}.exec( './' )[ 1 ]
    '.'
    > dir = {{alias}}.exec( '' )[ 1 ]
    ''

    See Also
    --------
